attributes.action: Reintroduce the death penalty for raping a child.
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is for the capital punishment to be reintroduced as a sentence for persons convicted for raping children. Not only can it leave a mental health scar that can lead to many mental illnesses in the future it can ruin their possibilities of having a stable health life. Imagine bearing the idea that you were raped for every single day of the rest of your life.

Using capital punishment for raping a child is justified and suitable.
